place.name: Beach
place.description: You look around and see a bunch of equipment stuff laying on the ground.

item.name: Machete
item.description: This is a sharp meele weapon which can also be used to cut plants.

item.name: Flashlight
item.description: The battery is on low charge but a small light is better than no light.

item.name: Rope
item.description: This is a long rope which has an iron hook at the end which can be used to climb.

place.name: Coast
place.description: You enter a barren Coast which borders on a deep Jungle.

item.name: Cloth
item.description: This is a part of a cloth which can be used as a bandage or to clean yourself or something else.

place.name: Jungle
place.description: You got lost in the downs of the deep Jungle. You can't orientate yourself.

item.name: Plank
item.description: This is a wooden plank which lied in the water at the beach.

place.name: Cave
place.description: You enter a dark cave. You can hear a drumming noise from the deeper inside.

item.name: Compass
item.description: The needle always sign to north. Now you can orientate yourself in the jungle.

place.name: Outback
place.description: After you followed the signed path, you enter the jungle's outback, which is less deep as the upper lands.

item.name: Signal Rocket
item.description: There is one missile left which can be used to call someones attention.

place.name: Beach at the other side
place.description: You found a way out of the jungle and enter the beach at the other side of the island. In the distance you can see the silhouette of a ship.

place.name: Ship of Coastguard
place.description: You are saved by the coastguard. Just in the moment you feel saved and rescued, you realize that it is not the coastguard but pirates who seem to use you as their new slave.

place.name: Bad Ending
place.description: The wood is old and rotten. It instantly breaks after you tried to walk on it and you fall to death.

place.name: Another Bad Ending
place.description: After you fired your Signal Rocket, you are hit by arrows. An unfriendly civilization of Indians found another human meal.

passage.name: High Cliff
passage.description: This is a very sharp and high cliff. You need something to climb it.

obstacle.description: You need to find a way to climb the cliff.
obstacle.resolution: You used the rope to climb the cliff.
